blocks.name: updateUser
blocks.description: Edit a user

args.name: userId
args.info: Id of the user to act on behalf of (default  = me)

args.name: videosPrivacyAdd
args.info: Sets the default add setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, anyone can add the video to an album, channel, or group.

args.name: videosPrivacyComments
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

args.name: videosPrivacyDownload
args.info: Sets the default download setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. If true, the video can be downloaded by any user

args.name: videosPrivacyEmbed
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.

args.name: videosPrivacyView
args.info: Sets the default comment setting for all future videos uploaded by this user. It specifies who can comment on the video.
